alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Brantley; Camden; Charlton; Clinch; Echols; Glynn; Pierce; Ware; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 04 at 1:29PM EST until January 04 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 13, PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON, IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA BAKER NASSAU IN NORTHERN FLORIDA COLUMBIA HAMILTON SUWANNEE IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA APPLING BACON BRANTLEY CAMDEN CHARLTON CLINCH ECHOLS GLYNN PIERCE WARE WAYNE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALMA, AMELIA CITY, ATKINSON, BAXLEY, BELMONT, BLACKSHEAR, COLUMBIA, COUNTRY CLUB ESTATE, DOCK JUNCTION, DOCTORTOWN, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, FERNANDINA BEACH, FOLKSTON, GARDI, GLYNN HAVEN, HICKOX, HILLIARD, HOBOKEN, HOMELAND, HOMERVILLE, HORTENSE, HOUSTON, JASPER, JEKYLL ISLAND, JENNINGS, JESUP, KINGS FERRY, KINGSLAND, LAKE CITY, LIVE OAK, LULU, MACCLENNY, MCALPIN, NAHUNTA, NEEDHAM, NEEDMORE, NEW LACY, NEWBURN, OLENO STATE PARK, OLUSTEE, PINE GROVE, PLANT HATCH, RACE POND, RATLIFF, RAYBON, SEA ISLAND, ST. GEORGE, ST. SIMONS, STATENVILLE, STEPHEN FOSTER STATE PARK, SUWANNEE SPRINGS, THALMANN, WATERTOWN, WAYCROSS, WAYNESVILLE, WEST LAKE, WHITE SPRINGS, WINOKUR, AND YULEE.
